Articles.Content:
Good job. Can't give you more rep yet argh.

Also since its dds texture does it not matter that much? Not sure.

I managed to save a couple of mb's, I think it reduced by more than 50%. Is dds the biggest one? Wich one are you using?

Hmm TGA may be better to reduce size. I will see what I can do.
Hi Mike, I'm glad to announce that with the last update of Real Plume, SPP is officially part of the Stock Config.
It is possible:) Yesterday I doking to shuttle airlock using only Canadaarm ( with my modification- rotation) But: it is too difficult:( May need extend doking range shuttle airlock?

It is possible:) Yesterday I doking to shuttle airlock using only Canadaarm ( with my modification- rotation) But: it is too difficult:( May need extend doking range shuttle airlock?

I just did it with the new arm. I'm compiling a tutorial movie right now, wil upload the complet package when finished. Probably within 2 hours.
Great! Thank you:) I will wait your release:)

Great! Thank you:) I will wait your release:)

Uploading right now. Unfortunately I have stone-age internet...

And here ya go: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132054-1-0-x-Canadarm-v1-50-%2810-Oct-2015%29

A video where you can see it in action :-)

Realy nice work!! Thank you!!!!!!!

I can`t do that... My cargo bay don`t have this attach point

And I have another problem: if put in cargo bay Shuttle heavy module (as Unity-1), your fuel is will end BEFORE you get the orbit Not enough fuel if fly with heavy module ( If your cargo bay is empty - all ok Try it... And you understand me... Ofcouse, you have else OSM engines, but when monopropelant will end before you begin you maneuver for dock

(Without RSS and RO)

now the SRB's separate better and don't flip out right away

Edited October 10, 2015 by Mike-NZ

Oooo!!! SRB good get down!!! At last:))) Thank you, Mike!

And some question: in your KSP, the shuttle stable when takeoff and climb? Because if I want will meet with another ship on orbit, I can not just go into another ship orbit. The shuttle moving left right, up and down. So the deviation is 18-20 degrees:((( After I must burning fuel for that would become equal the orbit.

If you can't understand me, I can get video ) Sorry, it is my bad English:(((

Oooo!!! SRB good get down!!! At last:))) Thank you, Mike!

And some question: in your KSP, the shuttle stable when takeoff and climb? Because if I want will meet with another ship on orbit, I can not just go into another ship orbit. The shuttle moving left right, up and down. So the deviation is 18-20 degrees:((( After I must burning fuel for that would become equal the orbit.

If you can't understand me, I can get video ) Sorry, it is my bad English:(((

You mean the oscillation during ascent. It tries to adjust its direction when going up. I will try make it stable so it wont wobble going up.

Exactly! That's what I mean:)) Well, I will waiting your fix and information.

Maybe it's happening because the ship gets less weight ? Fuel is burning and mass of the ship less?

When you start takeoff and climb the shuttle is stable. But if you start gravity turn or turn to orbit for meeting for another ship- shuttle begins moving left and right, up and down. You must hard using your keyboard for get him back to stable againe:( as result - many fuel is burn, and different orbit with another ship is 18-20 degrees:(

And Mike, where I can get new version with SRB fix?

I was build this ISS using Shuttle Discovery and Canadaarm ) Thank you Mike and Jeast I will continie bulding ISS
